headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting GE Vernova Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: GE Vernova has surged past the broader market over the past year, and analysts remain highly optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: GE Vernova Launches Grid Automation and Protection System
summary: Global energy company GE Vernova announced the launch of another offering in the group's GridBeats portfolio, which features software-defined automation solutions designed to modernize electrical grids by improving resilience, efficiency, and flexibility.

raw.headline: GE Vernova Launches Grid Automation and Protection System
raw.summary: Global energy company GE Vernova announced the launch of another offering in the group's GridBeats portfolio, which features software-defined automation solutions designed to modernize electrical grids by improving resilience, efficiency, and flexibility.

headline: Xcel Energy and GE Vernova Announce Strategic Alliance Agreement to Advance the Future of Energy
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, February 03, 2026--Xcel Energy and GE Vernova, today announced the signing of a landmark Strategic Alliance Agreement (SAA).

raw.headline: Xcel Energy and GE Vernova Announce Strategic Alliance Agreement to Advance the Future of Energy

headline: Siemens Energy to Spend $1 Billion to Boost Manufacturing of Electrical-Grid Equipment
summary: Investments include restarting manufacturing of gas turbines, the monster machines needed to supply reliable power for the AI-data-center boom.

headline: GE Vernova Inc. (GEV): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on GE Vernova Inc. on The Edge Of Power’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on GEV. GE Vernova Inc.’s share was trading at $717.39 as of January 29th. GEV’s trailing and forward P/E were 40.23 and 56.50 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. In April 2024, General Electric […]
